nodes.bodyText: just want to check on this title. Our java class and image is for Show labels on layer. But the title is Show labels on layers (plural). From memory this sample is only showing labels on one layer, so I think we should change the title back to singular layer?

nodes.bodyText: Thanks! There's been some lack of clarity regaring whether we can leave this key out alltogether, or whether it needs to stay in, with either [] or [""] as a value. Previously we've had it as [""] when submitting new samples, so I think it should be ok. I understand it gets automatically populated once the dev webpage is being build. @Rachael-E could you confirm?
